labels.analysis: The MCP Server provides real-time and historical Bitcoin market data from Binance through a standardized interface. Its core functionality revolves around retrieving and streaming cryptocurrency market data, including ticker information, order book data, recent trades, and price history. The tools available enable users to access up-to-date Bitcoin market insights, which is primarily useful for trading, analysis, and decision-making in the cryptocurrency space.
labels.reasoning: The primary label "Cryptocurrency & Blockchain" was chosen because the server's tools are specifically designed to interact with cryptocurrency markets, particularly Bitcoin on the Binance exchange. The secondary label "Data Analysis & Processing" is relevant because the historical price data and real-time updates can be used for market analysis and processing. The server does not have unique functionality that warrants a custom label beyond the predefined categories.

tools.name: get_bitcoin_ticker
tools.description: Get current Bitcoin ticker data including price, 24h change, volume, and more

tools.name: get_bitcoin_order_book
tools.description: Get current best bid and ask prices for Bitcoin

tools.name: get_bitcoin_price_history
tools.description: Get historical kline/candlestick data for Bitcoin

tools.name: get_realtime_bitcoin_price
tools.description: Get real-time Bitcoin price updates for a short period (5 seconds)

server_info_crawled.overview: Provide real-time and historical Bitcoin market data from Binance to large language models. Enable access to ticker data, order book prices, recent trades, and price history through a standardized interface. Stream short-duration real-time Bitcoin price updates for enhanced market insights.

tools.name: get_bitcoin_ticker
tools.description: Get current Bitcoin ticker data including price, 24h change, volume, and more

tools.description: Get current best bid and ask prices for Bitcoin

tools.name: get_bitcoin_price_history
tools.description: Get historical kline/candlestick data for Bitcoin

tools.name: get_realtime_bitcoin_price

server_info_crawled.python_sdk:
import mcp
from mcp.client.streamable_http import streamablehttp_client
import json
import base64

smithery_api_key = ""
url = f"https://server.smithery.ai/@MilesCool/binance-mcp/mcp?api_key={smithery_api_key}"

async def main():
    # Connect to the server using HTTP client
    async with streamablehttp_client(url) as (read_stream, write_stream, _):
        async with mcp.ClientSession(read_stream, write_stream) as session:
            # Initialize the connection
            await session.initialize()
            # List available tools
            tools_result = await session.list_tools()
            print(f"Available tools: {', '.join([t.name for t in tools_result.tools])}")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import asyncio
    asyncio.run(main())
